winners.overview:
The 2023 Kluz Prize for PeaceTech was awarded to Bogdan Ivanel, Founder and Chairperson of Commit Global. Three Special Distinctions were awarded to Ishraq Irteza (Deployment Strategist at Palantir Technologies’ Foundry) for Big Tech Building Peace, Megan Price (Executive Director of Human Rights Data Analysis Group) for a Non Profit Organization Advancing Peace, and Shawn Guttman (Co-Founder and CEO of Project Didi) for Innovative Use of AI/ML.

The 2023 Kluz Prize for PeaceTech was organized by Kluz Ventures with the support of The GovLab and awarded in September 2023, on the eve of the International Day of Peace during the 78th United Nations General Assembly. The Award Ceremony was held at the Union League Club in New York City.
